title: blank ssl warnings on client 1.2.0
body:
i just switched our owncloud server (apache) to using a signed certificate from verisign. now the client displays an error when connecting, "warnings about current ssl connection:" and rest of the dialog is blank. this happens only with the verisign certificate. another certificate i had signed with our own internal ca certificate worked as expected. error log from client (domain name replaced): ----------------------------- 01-31 16:26:20:939 "################## owncloud en_us 1.2.0 " 01-31 16:26:21:219 network location: "" 01-31 16:26:21:219 get request to "status.php" 01-31 16:26:21:219 returning configured owncloud url: "https://cloud.example.com/" 01-31 16:26:21:219 returning configured owncloud url: "https://cloud.example.com/" 01-31 16:26:21:219 setting up host header: "cloud.example.com" 01-31 16:26:21:289 ssl-warnings happened for url "https://cloud.example.com/status.php" 01-31 16:26:21:299 # # # # # # 01-31 16:26:21:299 "

warnings about current ssl connection:

" 01-31 16:26:21:299 style: "#cert {margin-left: 5px;} #ca_error { color:#a00011; margin-left:5px; margin-right:5px; }#ca_error p { margin-top: 2px; margin-bottom:2px; }#ccert { margin-left: 5px; }#issuer { margin-left: 5px; }tt { font-size: small; }" 01-31 16:26:24:239 00 client update check to "https://download.owncloud.com/clientupdater.php" 01-31 16:26:24:739 client is on latest version! 01-31 16:26:28:639 owncloudinfo network error: 6 01-31 16:26:28:639 status.php returns: "" 6 reply: qnetworkreplyimpl(0x26f0cb0) 01-31 16:26:28:639 no proper answer on "https://cloud.example.com/status.php" 01-31 16:26:28:639 ** application: no owncloud found! ---------------------------- output from openssl utility to test connection to the server: ------------------------------------ connected(00000003) depth=3 /c=us/o=verisign, inc./ou=class 3 public primary certification authority verify return:1 depth=2 /c=us/o=verisign, inc./ou=verisign trust network/ou=(c) 2006 verisign, inc. - for authorized use only/cn=verisign class 3 public primary certification autho rity - g5 verify return:1 depth=1 /c=us/o=verisign, inc./ou=verisign trust network/ou=terms of use at https://www.verisign.com/rpa (c)10/cn=verisign class 3 secure server ca - g3 verify return:1 depth=0 /c=us/st=arizona/l=tucson/o=org name removed/ou=department/ou=terms of use at www.verisign.com/rpa (c)05/cn=cloud.example.com verify return:1 --- certificate chain 0 s:/c=us/st=arizona/l=tucson/o=org name removed/ou=department removed/ou=terms of use at www.verisign.com/rpa (c)05/cn=cloud.example.com i:/c=us/o=verisign, inc./ou=verisign trust network/ou=terms of use at https://www.verisign.com/rpa (c)10/cn=verisign class 3 secure server ca - g3 1 s:/c=us/o=verisign, inc./ou=verisign trust network/ou=terms of use at https://www.verisign.com/rpa (c)10/cn=verisign class 3 secure server ca - g3 i:/c=us/o=verisign, inc./ou=verisign trust network/ou=(c) 2006 verisign, inc. - for authorized use only/cn=verisign class 3 public primary certification authorit y - g5 2 s:/c=us/o=verisign, inc./ou=verisign trust network/ou=(c) 2006 verisign, inc. - for authorized use only/cn=verisign class 3 public primary certification authorit y - g5 i:/c=us/o=verisign, inc./ou=class 3 public primary certification authority --- server certificate -----begin certificate----- -----end certificate----- subject=/c=us/st=arizona/l=tucson/o=org name removed/ou=department removed/ou=terms of use at www.verisign.com/rpa (c)05/cn=cloud.example.com issuer=/c=us/o=verisign, inc./ou=verisign trust network/ou=terms of use at https://www.verisign.com/rpa (c)10/cn=verisign class 3 secure server ca - g3 --- no client certificate ca names sent --- ssl handshake has read 5375 bytes and written 319 bytes --- new, tlsv1/sslv3, cipher is dhe-rsa-aes256-sha server public key is 4096 bit secure renegotiation is supported compression: none expansion: none ssl-session: protocol : tlsv1 cipher : dhe-rsa-aes256-sha session-id: 3aa0179d95ba1bcbfe185bad60672152f2d85d3a4d15da8b3862569225fa6d6d session-id-ctx: master-key: 3781737264aafccf096024aeebe29fdd15d12ab1ed7a83fe917ccb0a4463636c6c7cbaece2335578c87c82f77be9f840 key-arg : none krb5 principal: none start time: 1359729548 timeout : 300 (sec) verify return code: 0 (ok) --- get /status.php {"installed":"true","version":"4.90.7","versionstring":"4.5.6","edition":""}closed
